DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate effect resveratrol inflammatory mediator insulin resistance cellular molecular level obese non diabetic type 2 diabetic subject vivo . This research investigate hypothesis resveratrol , give orally obese type 2 diabetic subject induce decrease reactive oxygen specie ( ROS ) generation pro-inflammatory transcription factor nuclear factor-kB ( NF-kB ) inflammatory mediator regulate . The hypothesis resveratrol suppress high fat , high carbohydrate ( HFHC ) meal induced inflammatory oxidative response , also investigate . This research also investigate hypothesis resveratrol intake 12 week improve insulin sensitivity lower Homeostasis model assessment insulin resistance ( HOMA-IR ) , index insulin resistance , resveratrol intake cause increase incretins .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 20 year age old 2 . Healthy Obese subject BMI > 30 3 . Type 2 Diabetics BMI > 30 4 . Subjects good peripheral vein . 5 . Subjects statins , ACE inhibitor thiazolidenediones allow long stable dos compound dosage change course study . 1 . Subjects antioxidant medication 2 . Patient nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug 3 . On agent significant antioxidant property . 4 . History drug alcohol abuse 5 . Any life threaten disease 6 . Allergy peanut , grape , wine , mulberry . 7 . Pregnant woman . 8 . Coronary event procedure ( myocardial infarction , unstable angina , coronary artery bypass surgery coronary angioplasty ) previous four week . 9 . Subjects anticoagulant .
